top source hiihat_parse_config_file

initialization

result = hiihat_parse_config_file( [cfg_file=string] [, def_file=string] [, /save_defaults] [, /verbose] [, /defaults_only])

Parses configuration parameters in the (global) hiihat.sav file and (user-defined) hiihat.cfg parameter file. If save_defaults is true, the default parameters in hiihat.sav are overwritten. Global parameters can be accessed via the hiihat_get_config_param function.

Keywords

cfg_file in optional type=string

config file to parse (default: hiihat.cfg)

def_file in optional type=string

.sav file to parse and optionally write (default: hiihat_defaults.sav)

save_defaults in optional type=boolean

overwrite defaults saved in hiihat_defaults.sav file

verbose in optional type=boolean

print verbose output to console

defaults_only in optional type=boolean

use default values only (don't parse cfg file)

Examples

The following code will parse the config file "input.cfg" and save the parsed values to the "defaults.sav" file:

hiihat_parse_config_file, cfg_file='input.cfg', def_file='defaults.sav', $ save_defaults=1

Author information
